peril.views.slick.components.menus

Class WarMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • peril.views.slick.util.Viewable
      • peril.views.slick.util.Clickable
        • peril.views.slick.components.menus.Menu
          • peril.views.slick.components.menus.WarMenu
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Component, Container

    public final class WarMenu
extends Menu
    Displays the CombatHelper from the Attack to the user.
    Since:
    2018-03-15
    Version:
    1.01.06
    Author:
    Joshua_Eddy, Ezekiel_Trinidad
    See Also:
    Menu, Attack, SlickSquad, SlickSquadMember

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void attack()
      Causes the CombatHelper to process a CombatRound with the ModelSquads currently in the WarMenu.
      void clear()
      Clears the elements of and hides the WarMenu.
      void draw(Frame frame)
      Draws the WarMenu on the screen.
      void hide()
      Hides this WarMenu.
      void init()
      Initialises all the visual elements of WarMenu.
      void moveComponents(Point vector)
      Moves all the visual components of the WarMenu along a specified Point vector.
      void selectMaxUnits()
      Selects the ModelUnits to be SlickSquadMembers of the attackingSquad that will result in the strongest possible attackingSquad.
      void show()
      Makes this WarMenu visible along with its attack Button.

        Constructs a new WarMenu.
        Parameters:
        position - The initial Point position of the WarMenu.
